description:
Montreal, Feb. 10, 2014 - Hacking Health co-founder Dominic Savoie explains how and why this now global/local event gets technology creators and healthcare professionals working together.

Useful links:
* Hacking Health: http://www.hackinghealth.ca
* Dominic : http://sflx.ca/dsavoie
* MP43: http://montrealpython.org/fr/2014/02/mp43/
* Montreal Python: http://montrealpython.org
* Savoir-faire Linux: http://www.savoirfairelinux.com
title: Inside Hacking Health #MP43
